msgSnippet: Hi All pl go through the code: { ..... TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(); ThreadBarrier barrier = new ThreadBarrier(3); Timer timer  = new
messageBody:
Hi All
pl go through the code:
{
.....

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
ThreadBarrier barrier = new ThreadBarrier(3);
Timer timer = new ConstantTimer(10000);

PerfTestCaseABC testCase = new PerfTestCaseABC(testName);

Test loadTest1 = new LoadTest(testCase, noUsers, iter, timer);

Test threadTest1 = new ThreadedTest(loadTest1);

suite.addTest(threadTest1);
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite);
}
1) Is it the way to run the ThreadedTest class?
2) My requirement is to test some test cases with different parameters
(like no of users, iterations..)How can I do it??

Thanx to all
Madhu
